title: 超实用生活英语（天气篇）
content: What’s the weather like?天气怎么样？What’s the weather like in Beijing in summer?北京夏天的天气怎么样？How's it like outside today?今天外面天气怎么样？How’s the weather like in London in winter?伦敦冬天的天气怎么样？What's the weather going to be tomorrow?明天天气怎么样？Will it rain tomorrow？明天会下雨吗？What does the weather forecast say?天气预报怎么说？Have you heard the weather forecast?你听天气预报了吗？What do you think of the weather here?你认为这的天气怎么样？Is this a rainy day?这是一个下雨天吗？Is it rainy?在下雨吗？What great weather we are having today!今天天气真好！Isn’t it a lovely/fine/nice day?天气真好！A lovely/beautiful day, isn’t it?天气真好！It’s a lovely/nice/glorious day.天气真好！What fine this day！今天天气真好！What fine weather it is！天气真好！The weather of today is really good/wonderful.今天天气真好！The weather is terrible.天气真糟糕。What lousy weather?天气真糟糕。What terrible/awful weather（we’ve been having）！天气真糟糕。The weather really sucks today.今天天气真糟糕。It’s awful weather we are having, isn’t it?今天天气真糟糕。Horrible weather we’re having.糟糕的天气。The weather is really miserable.天气真糟糕。What's the temperature?今天的温度是多少？What’s the average temperature in London on a summer’s day?伦敦夏天的平均温度是多少？How hot is it outside？外面有多热？It's twenty degrees centigrade today.今天是摄氏二十度。It's two below zero.零下两度。The temperature has climbed to 35 C.气温已上升到摄氏35度。The high is around 20 degrees.今天最高20度左右。The temperature rose suddenly.气温骤升。The lowest temperature can reach over 30 degrees below zero centigrade.最低温度可达零下30多摄氏度。The low for today is 15 degrees.今天的最低气温是15度。The temperature fell hard.气温骤降。It’s sunny/gloomy/cloudy/windy/rainy.晴天/阴天/多云/刮风/下雨。The weather forecast says that it's going to be fine for the next few days.天气预报说未来几天天气会很好。It was very hot and humid.这里的天气又热又潮。It has keen pouring rain for days and it's freezing！接连几天都在下雨，天气很冷！Nice and sunny day.天气晴朗。The sun is shining.阳光明媚。It’s supposed to be sunny all week.预计本周都是晴天。The sky is clear/blue/cloudless.天空好晴朗/蓝/万里无云。It was a nasty windy day.这是一个恶劣的大风天。The sky looks as if it would clear off soon.天空看上去马上就要放晴了。It seems as if there will be a thunderstorm.好像要有雷雨了。What a downpour!好大的雨啊！It’s raining heavily.雨下得真大。It has rained for several days.已经下了几天的雨了。It’s very cool today.今天真凉快。It’s starting to snow outside.外面开始下雪了。The weather is looking up.天气正在好转。The cold wave is coming.寒潮要来了。The summer is marvelous here.这里的夏天太棒了。We have a wet summer here.我们这的夏天多雨。They said yesterday was the hottest day of the year so far.他们说昨天是今年迄今为止最热的一天。I can’t believe it only mid-may. It’s so hot outside.我不敢相信现在才5月中旬，外面就这么热了。It’s a good day for a picnic/football.这是野餐/踢足球的好天气。It will get warmer/colder as the day goes by. 天气会越来越暖和/冷的。链接： 提取码：boom 来源| 网络综合如有侵权联系删除一对一，随时随地练听说，现在赠送一节试听课
